description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会领导财经工作的决策议事协调机构，是中华人民共和国经济的核心领导和决策部门。2018年由中央财经领导小组改组而成。
description.en: The decision-making, deliberative, and coordinating body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China that leads financial and economic work. It is the core leadership and decision-making department for the economy of the People's Republic of China. It was reorganized from the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央书记处书记、中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat and Director of the General Office of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Premier of the State Council.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中央财经委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央财经委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 中央财经委员会的办事机构，是中国经济决策的核心部门。
description.en: The administrative body of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission, and the core department for economic decision-making in China.

nodes.id: 中央财政经济领导小组

zh-cn: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 中央财经委员会的前身，负责领导中国财经工作。
description.en: The predecessor of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission, responsible for leading China's financial and economic work.

nodes.id: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

zh-cn: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月由中共中央印发的文件，该方案将中央财经领导小组等机构改为委员会。
description.en: A document issued by the CCP Central Committee in March 2018, which transformed the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs and other bodies into commissions.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共八大元老之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, one of the Eight Elders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共八大元老之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, one of the Eight Elders of the Communist Party of China.

location.zh-cn: 北平市朝阳门内大街九爷府
location.en: Jiu Ye Fu, Chaoyangmen Inner Street, Beiping

description.zh-cn: 1949年成立的中央财经委员会，最初隶属于中央军委，后移交中央人民政府并更名。
description.en: The Central Financial and Economic Commission established in 1949, initially subordinate to the Central Military Commission, later transferred to the Central People's Government and renamed.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military leading body of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年－1954年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年－1954年)
中华人民共和国中央人民政府

description.zh-cn: 1949年至1954年间中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China from 1949 to 1954.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法

description.zh-cn: 1949年9月27日由中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议通过的法律，规定了中央人民政府的组织结构。
description.en: A law passed on September 27, 1949, by the First Plenary Session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, which stipulated the organizational structure of the Central People's Government.

nodes.id: 政务院财政经济委员会

zh-cn: 政务院财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 1949年由中央财经委员会更名而来，隶属于政务院。
description.en: Renamed from the Central Financial and Economic Commission in 1949, subordinate to the Government Administration Council.

nodes.id: 中共中央政治局常委会

zh-cn: 中共中央政治局常委会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 国务院财政经济委员会

zh-cn: 国务院财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 1979年至1980年间存在的国务院下属机构，后被中央财政经济领导小组取代。
description.en: A subordinate body of the State Council that existed from 1979 to 1980, later replaced by the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记、国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在北京的政治风波。
description.en: A political turmoil that occurred in Beijing in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院副总理、中央财经领导小组办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Vice Premier of the State Council and Director of the Office of the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，财政部副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Vice Minister of Finance.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央财经委员会是中国共产党中央委员会领导财经工作的决策议事协调机构。
description.en: The Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission is a decision-making, deliberative, and coordinating body under the leadership of the CCP Central Committee for financial and economic work.

relationships.source: 中央财经委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 中央财经委员会办公室是中央财经委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The Office of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission is the administrative body of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 担任中央财经委员会主任。
description.en: Serves as the Director of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中央委员会时期的中央财经委员会副主任。
description.en: Serves as the Deputy Director of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission during the term of the 20th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中央委员会时期的中央财经委员会委员。
description.en: Serves as a Member of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission during the term of the 20th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中央委员会时期的中央财经委员会委员。
description.en: Serves as a Member of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission during the term of the 20th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中央委员会时期的中央财经委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Serves as the Director of the Office of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission during the term of the 20th Central Committee.

relationships.source: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

description.zh-cn: 根据该方案，中央财经领导小组改为中央财经委员会。
description.en: According to this plan, the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs was transformed into the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 1949年6月4日，陈云、薄一波开始筹组中央财经委员会。
description.en: On June 4, 1949, Chen Yun and Bo Yibo began organizing the Central Financial and Economic Commission.

description.zh-cn: 1949年6月4日，陈云、薄一波开始筹组中央财经委员会。
description.en: On June 4, 1949, Chen Yun and Bo Yibo began organizing the Central Financial and Economic Commission.

description.zh-cn: 担任1949年成立的中央财经委员会主任。
description.en: Served as the Director of the Central Financial and Economic Commission established in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 担任1949年成立的中央财经委员会副主任。
description.en: Served as the Deputy Director of the Central Financial and Economic Commission established in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 1949年成立的中央财经委员会暂时隶属中央军委。
description.en: The Central Financial and Economic Commission established in 1949 was temporarily subordinate to the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府组织法
relationships.target: 政务院财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据该法，中央财经委员会更名为政务院财政经济委员会。
description.en: According to this law, the Central Financial and Economic Commission was renamed the Financial and Economic Committee of the Government Administration Council.

relationships.source: 中共中央政治局常委会
relationships.target: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 1980年3月17日决定成立中央财政经济领导小组。
description.en: Decided on March 17, 1980, to establish the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs.

relationships.source: 中央财政经济领导小组
relationships.target: 国务院财政经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央财政经济领导小组取代了国务院财政经济委员会。
description.en: The Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs replaced the State Council's Financial and Economic Commission.

relationships.target: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 担任中央财政经济领导小组组长。
description.en: Served as the leader of the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 因六四事件，赵紫阳下台。
description.en: Zhao Ziyang was removed from power due to the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 1989年7月28日，中共中央决定撤销中央财经领导小组。
description.en: On July 28, 1989, the CCP Central Committee decided to abolish the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 1992年12月28日，中央财经领导小组恢复设立。
description.en: On December 28, 1992, the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs was re-established.

relationships.target: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 在中央财经领导小组恢复设立后兼任组长。
description.en: Concurrently served as the leader of the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs after its re-establishment.

relationships.target: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 担任第十七届中央委员会时期的中央财经领导小组组长。
description.en: Served as the leader of the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs during the term of the 17th Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 担任第十七届中央委员会时期的中央财经领导小组副组长。
description.en: Served as the deputy leader of the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs during the term of the 17th Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 担任第十八届、十九届（改革前）中央委员会时期的中央财经领导小组组长。
description.en: Served as the leader of the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs during the terms of the 18th and 19th (pre-reform) Central Committees.

relationships.target: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 担任第十八届、十九届（改革前）中央委员会时期的中央财经领导小组副组长。
description.en: Served as the deputy leader of the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs during the terms of the 18th and 19th (pre-reform) Central Committees.

description.zh-cn: 担任第十九届（改革后）中央委员会时期的中央财经委员会副主任。
description.en: Served as the Deputy Director of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission during the term of the 19th (post-reform) Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 担任第十八届、十九届（改革前）中央财经领导小组办公室主任。
description.en: Served as the Director of the Office of the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs during the 18th and 19th (pre-reform) terms.

description.zh-cn: 担任第十九届（改革后）中央财经委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Served as the Director of the Office of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission during the 19th (post-reform) term.

relationships.target: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 担任第十九届（改革前）中央财经领导小组成员。
description.en: Served as a member of the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs during the 19th (pre-reform) term.

description.zh-cn: 担任第十九届（改革后）中央财经委员会委员。
description.en: Served as a member of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission during the 19th (post-reform) term.

relationships.target: 中央财政经济领导小组

description.zh-cn: 担任第十九届（改革前）中央财经领导小组成员。
description.en: Served as a member of the Central Leading Group for Financial and Economic Affairs during the 19th (pre-reform) term.

description.zh-cn: 担任第十九届（改革后）中央财经委员会委员。
description.en: Served as a member of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission during the 19th (post-reform) term.

description.zh-cn: 担任第十九届（改革后）中央财经委员会办公室副主任。
description.en: Served as the Deputy Director of the Office of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Commission during the 19th (post-reform) term.
